base.name: Homestead
base.description: Your home continent, your their innate magic first awakened. Hearths and halls here echo with quiet power.

earth.name: Stoneward
earth.description: Stoneward is a land of cliffs and deep roots, where mountains hum with ancient patience. Its people prize endurance, craft, and the slow strength of the world below.

fire.name: Emberfall
fire.description: Emberfall blazes with restless heat, forging will and weapon in equal measure. Its glow inspires courage, but demands respect for the flames within.

water.name: Tidevein
water.description: Tidevein is a sweeping coast of tides and hidden channels, forever shifting yet never lost. Its calm hides depth, healing, and the pull of distant seas.

light.name: Lumenrise
light.description: Lumenrise is a bright realm of wards and radiant halls, where truth is prized like gold. Hope and protection flow from its temples into the wider world.

lightning.name: Stormcoil
lightning.description: Stormcoil crackles with sudden storms and humming spires of glass. Its people favor precision and speed, striking fast before the thunder fades.

dark.name: Umbravale
dark.description: Umbravale stretches beneath long dusk, where secrets linger and power gathers in silence. Shadow is not evil here, but a veil for resilience and resolve.

ice.name: Frostcrown
ice.description: Frostcrown crowns the far north in crystal winds and silent drifts. Its cold teaches patience, and its jagged beauty rewards those who endure.

wind.name: Skylark Reach
wind.description: Skylark Reach rides the high currents, a chain of skybridges and open plains. Swift caravans and watchful towers thrive on speed, clarity, and free air.
